svg.title: Comparison azimuthal projections
svg.desc: Comparison of some azimuthal projections of the world map centred on the North Pole, ordered by mean altitudes in Earth radii, by CMG Lee based on information on http://www.progonos.com/furuti/MapProj/Normal/ProjAz/projAz.html . Circles denote latitudes of multiples of 15-degrees (dashed lines represent the southern hemisphere).
